text: @realDonaldTrump Donald, what in the hell are you talking about? This tweet is an unintelligible mess.  And why, 3 months into the coronavirus crisis, is your government just now checking into what 3M's mask/respirator manufacturing & sales pracb are doing? You are an IDIOT!
